001package fr.aumgn.dac2.commands;
002
003import org.bukkit.command.CommandSender;
004import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
005
006import fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.command.Command;
007import fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.command.NestedCommands;
008import fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.command.args.CommandArgs;
009import fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.command.exception.CommandError;
010import fr.aumgn.dac2.DAC;
011import fr.aumgn.dac2.arena.Arena;
012import fr.aumgn.dac2.game.Game;
013import fr.aumgn.dac2.game.GameFactory;
014import fr.aumgn.dac2.game.start.GameQuickStart;
015import fr.aumgn.dac2.stage.Stage;
016import fr.aumgn.dac2.stage.join.JoinStage;
017
018@NestedCommands("dac2")
019public class StageCommands extends DACCommands {
020
021    public StageCommands(DAC dac) {
022        super(dac);
023    }
024
025    @Command(name = "initialize", min = 0, max = 1)
026    public void init(CommandSender sender, CommandArgs args) {
027        Arena arena = args.get(0, Arena)
028                .valueWithPermOr("dac.stages.init.arena", sender);
029
030        JoinStage joinStage = new JoinStage(dac, arena);
031        dac.getStages().start(joinStage);
032
033        if (!(sender instanceof Player)) {
034            sender.sendMessage(msg("init.success", arena.getName()));
035        }
036    }
037
038    @Command(name = "join", min = 0, max = -1, argsFlags = "a")
039    public void join(Player sender, CommandArgs args) {
040        if (dac.getStages().get(sender) != null) {
041            throw new CommandError(msg("join.alreadyingame"));
042        }
043
044        Arena arena = args.get('a', Arena)
045                .valueWithPermOr("dac2.stages.join.arena", sender);
046        Stage stage = dac.getStages().get(arena);
047
048        if (!(stage instanceof JoinStage)) {
049            throw new CommandError(msg("join.notjoinable"));
050        }
051
052        ((JoinStage) stage).addPlayer(sender, args.asList());
053    }
054
055    @Command(name = "stop", min = 0, max = 1, argsFlags = "a")
056    public void stop(CommandSender sender, CommandArgs args) {
057        Stage stage = args.get(0, Stage)
058                .valueWithPermOr("dac2.stage.stop.others", sender);
059
060        dac.getStages().forceStop(stage);
061        sender.sendMessage(msg("stop.success", stage.getArena().getName()));
062    }
063
064    @Command(name = "start", min = 0, max = 1, argsFlags = "a")
065    public void start(CommandSender sender, CommandArgs args) {
066        Stage stage = args.get('a', Stage)
067                .valueWithPermOr("dac2.stage.start.others", sender);
068        String gameMode = args.get(0, "classic");
069
070        if (stage == null) {
071            throw new CommandError(msg("start.notajoinstage"));
072        } else if (!(stage instanceof JoinStage)) {
073            throw new CommandError(msg("start.alreadystarted"));
074        }
075
076        JoinStage joinStage = (JoinStage) stage;
077        GameFactory factory = GameFactory.getByAlias(dac, gameMode);
078        if (joinStage.size() < factory.getMinimumPlayers()) {
079            throw new CommandError(msg("start.notenoughplayers"));
080        }
081        Game game = factory.createGame(dac, joinStage);
082        dac.getStages().switchTo(game);
083    }
084
085    @Command(name = "quickstart", min = 0, max = 1, argsFlags = "a")
086    public void quickstart(CommandSender sender, CommandArgs args) {
087        Arena arena = args.get('a', Arena)
088                .valueWithPermOr("dac.stages.quickstart.arena", sender);
089
090        String gameMode = args.get(0, "classic");
091        GameQuickStart quickStart = new GameQuickStart(dac, arena);
092        GameFactory factory = GameFactory.getByAlias(dac, gameMode);
093        if (quickStart.size() < factory.getMinimumPlayers()) {
094            throw new CommandError(msg("quickstart.notenoughplayers"));
095        }
096        Game game = factory.createGame(dac, quickStart);
097        dac.getStages().start(game);
098    }
099}
